summary: A comprehensive unit test suite that validates the configuration, forward pass, output consistency, token embedding management, serialization, and training behaviors—including gradient checkpointing options—of an alternative CLIP text encoder model.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the AltCLIP text encoder so it can be reliably deployed in multimodal applications such as image‑text retrieval, captioning, and cross‑modal search.
